full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## PASS - Financial Accounting Services for Health Canada’s Inventory of Rapid Tests

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)**: 1000244647
* **Reference Number (numéro de référence)**: PW-22-01018610
* **Contracting Entity (entité contractante)**: Health Canada (Santé Canada)
* **Notice URL (URL de l'avis)**: [See attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/e4f5cf744552a794cd88ca446771a154/npp_1000246647_english_2022.12.06.pdf) [See attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/f65d61252a0faf68c8b22294c686dcc1/npp_french_1000246647_2022.12.06.pdf)
* **Contact Information (informations de contact)**:
	+ Name (nom): Eryn Mathers
	+ Email (courriel): [Mathers.Eryn@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:Mathers.Eryn@hc-sc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone (téléphone): 613-298-2804

### Background Information

Health Canada (Santé Canada) requires financial accounting services to support the management of the rapid testing inventory.

### Request for Proposal

This request for proposal is a competitive, selective process. The contract will be awarded to a supplier who can provide effective financial accounting services.

### Description of the Requirement

The contract will provide for the management of the inventory of rapid testing devices. The supplier will be responsible for executing all financial accounting functions related to the inventory, including the management of purchase orders, receipts, and storage of the devices. The proposed period of the contract is from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024, inclusive. An option for an additional year from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, may be exercised at the discretion of the contracting entity.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA). Suppliers who are not Canadian nationals or proponents and do not meet the domestic content requirements will be subject to these trade agreements.
